mapper.select: select mem_userid,mem_password,mem_username,mem_email, to_char(mem_birthday,'yyyy"년" mm"월" dd"일" hh24"시":mi"분"') mem_birthday,mem_sex, mem_phone,mem_address,to_char(mem_register_date,'yyyy"년" mm"월" dd"일" hh24"시":mi"분"') mem_register_date, mem_photo,mem_is_employer from meminfo where mem_userid=#{mem_userid}
